CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 2, 1955, pg. 26 reads: " Thousands Thrilled at Courier Home Service Fair...6. The Pet Milk Company booth, represented by Ben Richardson and Wilbur Creelman, had lovely Miss Hannah Fletcher acting as hostess...Harris Photos"
TitMainTitle: Ben Richardson, Hannah Fletcher, and Wilbur Creelman, standing in Pet Milk booth in Syria Mosque for the 1955 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
